meanings.definition: A type of antibiotic used to treat bacterial infections.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed amoxicillins to help fight the infection.
meanings.sent2: I took the amoxicillins three times a day as directed.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria threw a party, but amoxicillins crashed it!
meanings.sent4: The amoxicillins were like tiny soldiers battling the bacteria invaders.
meanings.sent5: The bottle of amoxicillins glowed with the promise of healing.

meanings.sent1: She bought two bottles of amoxicillins from the pharmacy.
meanings.sent2: The amoxicillins were running low, so she needed a refill.
meanings.sent3: The amoxicillins decided to have a party in the medicine cabinet.
meanings.sent4: In the battle against infection, the amoxicillins stood united.
meanings.sent5: The colorful capsules of amoxicillins sparkled like gems in the sunlight.
